title: Avalanche Hazard Forecasting
text:
This website presents the work for Assignment 1 of the STA5073Z - Data Science for Industry 2025 course at the University of Cape Town.
Our project focuses on constructing and evaluating a neural network model to predict the Forecasted Avalanche Hazard (FAH) using a 15-year archive of data from the Scottish Avalanche Information Service (SAIS). By combining topographic, meteorological, and snow pack test data, we aim to model the complex decision-making process of expert avalanche forecasters.

title: Avalanche Hazard Forecasting
text:
Project Deliverables

:material-file-document: Scientific Report
The main project report detailing our methodology, analysis, and findings.
:material-robot-excited: LLM Reflection
A critical assessment of how we used large language models (e.g., ChatGPT) to assist with this project.
